name: Guard's Zone
description:
We recommend to play in fullscreen when playing in browser!

You are the mall guard. Unfortunately people lose their items. It's your job to find them! Be careful to not hit customers - you will lose time! You have 4 minutes to find as many as you can. Good luck!

Game made for Global Game Jam 2021! Theme for the jam was "Lost & Found"
Made with Unity and VoxEdit

Source: https://github.com/dziemo/GGJ2021
